name: Dinkle Doughnuts Arcade
description:
This game was originally coded in Pocket Code for Android, and I ported it to Scratch later. Now I ported it to GameMaker to have a more up-to-date version of this old ass game.

The goal of the game, fill in as many orders as you can before you run out of time. Pick the wrong donut, and its game over. Have fun :).
